question.question: When managing acute abdominal pain in a pregnant woman, which of the following is the most appropriate initial step?
question.option_a: Immediately perform an ultrasound to rule out ectopic pregnancy
question.option_b: Administer pain medication to alleviate discomfort before further examination
question.option_c: Conduct a detailed medical history and physical examination
question.option_d: Order a full blood count and liver function tests
